Flow.description: This flow clones the Approval Business Rule along with the related Service Approvers. This also checks duplicate Business Rules.

formulas.name: fm_errorMessage
formulas.expression: LEFT({!$Flow.FaultMessage}, FIND("You can look up ExceptionCode", {!$Flow.FaultMessage} ) - 1 )

Flow.label: CustomCloningBusinessRule

value.stringValue: Exception occurs while fetching Business Rule Record or Related Service Approval Records
Get Record Element Error from Flow

fields.name: Heading
fields.fieldText: New Business Rule: Approval

fields.name: Required
fields.fieldText: * = Required Information

fields.name: Select_Type
fields.fieldText: Do you like to clone as a New Service Type or Pickup Type?
